publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-771 Richard Lochhead on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee: The European Commission's Work Programme for 2004-That the Parliament notes the publication of the European Commission's work programme for 2004, which is dominated by the enlargement of the European Union, and agrees that it contains a number of legislative and non-legislative plans of importance to Scotland.
S2M-771 The European Commission's Work Programme for 2004 (lodged on 9 January 2004) Irene Oldfather*
